overview: The unemployed Yin Yin, in the unintentional pit of the good brothers and the crazy chasing of the black road dragon brother, accidentally sneaked into the Ruyi Jiazheng company, but he just got out of the wolf and into the tiger's mouth, and the housekeeping boss helped Yin Yin escape. As a result of the pursuit of killing Yin Yin to do his own free labor, Yin Yu began his male career as an extraordinary and hilarious family life career... Love the vain single mother Wang Lei, naughty Tao Tao, Mei Ling’s mother-in-law, Xiao San The intent of the intrigue is related to the mystery of Yin Hao’s being chased by Long Ge, and it also detonated the final battle between Yin Yi’s unaccompanied person and the gangster’s dragon brother.... ..
title: Double Shadow
